formattedAddress: 135 W 18th St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 135 W 18th St, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text:
ADP has the worst customer service for its clients, given that it’s one of the bigger companies in the US that handles payroll.

The site itself is great - good reports, functional, the system is amazing.

The customer service on the other hand, is dismal. No proper response, extremely slow, rude.

ADP also releases licenses to smaller third party services and it’s terrible. Rude and racist.

originalText.text:
very dishonest and unprofessional service.. the sales rep lady, Marilyn Maldonado, confirmed in writing a lie, just to get us switching to them for payroll. Good thing we did not cancel our existing payroll services yet, before we figure the dishonesty in ADP advertised services, or lack thereof, and continued with our existing service provider, paychex.
Dan
Redan Medical Inc.

originalText.text: A manager named Azeem Mithani was extremely rude to customers. You should give him a break because customers can feel how much hate he has for this job.

text.text: A manager named Azeem Mithani was extremely rude to customers. You should give him a break because customers can feel how much hate he has for this job.

originalText.text: Do not EVER use this company. They accidentally cancelled everyone's insurance at my place of employment, took weeks to reinstate it and it is still incorrect. I haven't been able to get reimbursed for the simplest of things because their people do not communicate. An absolutely horrible and unimaginably broken company.

originalText.text: Spent weeks getting onboarded, for the “back end” to deny my application without any explanation. Terrible company.
